about_the_game:
DragonStone is a dark fantasy Visual Novel with high replayability, where you are given choices throughout the story that affect the characters and outcome. Myranda's journey begins in a world of dark fantasy where magic and mythical creatures abound. The game is a visual novel where players will control Myranda as she navigates through the war-torn kingdoms and encounters a cast of unique characters.

The game's story is centered on Myranda, a young woman from a small village who becomes caught up in a war between two kingdoms. As the story progresses, players will be presented with choices that will affect the outcome of the game.

One of the most significant choices players will face is Myranda's decision to befriend an ancient dragon to defeat the dark forces threatening the kingdoms. This decision will take players on a journey filled with action, adventure, and intrigue.


The game boasts thousands of high-resolution images that bring the game's world to life. Each image is carefully crafted to showcase the game's characters, creatures, and landscapes in stunning detail. Players will be immersed in a rich and immersive world filled with dark forests, icy tundras, and fiery mountains.

In addition to the images, the game also features hundreds of animations that help bring the game's characters and creatures to life. These animations range from subtle movements to dramatic action scenes, all designed to enhance the game's storytelling.


As players progress through the game, they will encounter a diverse cast of characters, each with their own motivations and secrets. Players must navigate through the complexities of this war-torn world and decide who to trust and who to ally with.


The game's story is dark and foreboding, with a focus on the consequences of war and the sacrifices required to achieve peace. Players will be forced to make difficult choices and confront the harsh realities of the game's world.

Overall, the game is a thrilling and immersive experience that combines stunning visuals with compelling storytelling. With thousands of high-resolution images and hundreds of animations, players will be transported to a world of dark fantasy and adventure. You decide in this sprawling 18+ sandbox Visual Novel containing full motion adult scenes rendered in stunning 1920 x 1080 high resolution!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MACOS 11 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1080 and higher ; ATI radeon RX and higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or higher
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MACOS 11 or newer
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1080 and higher ; ATI radeon RX and higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or higher

name: DragonStone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1080 and higher ; ATI radeon RX and higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 equivalent or greater ; ATI radeon RX and higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or higher

short_description: A dark fantasy Visual Novel with an emphasis on creativity instead of combat. Myranda's journey begins in a world of dark fantasy where magic and mythical creatures abound.
